create_statement: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`autofms`@`124.61.40.216` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `contract_history_view` AS select `ch`.`contract_history_id` AS `contract_history_id`,`ch`.`member_id` AS `member_id`,`ch`.`contract_id` AS `contract_id`,`ch`.`contract_date` AS `contract_date`,`ch`.`contract_register` AS `contract_register`,`c`.`contract_id` AS `contract_original_id`,`c`.`contract_name` AS `contract_name`,`c`.`contract_status` AS `contract_status`,`m`.`member_name` AS `member_name` from ((`contract_history` `ch` join `contracts` `c` on(`ch`.`contract_id` = `c`.`contract_id`)) join `members` `m` on(`ch`.`member_id` = `m`.`member_id`))
